name: Travel The Package
description:
Game:

You are on an plane and you have packages. You should deliver them.

But you are using a broken radar, so the accuracy of the location where you need to deliver the package is very low.

Try to calculate or guess at which point you need to deliver the package. The closer you get to the desired point, the more points you get.


Controls:

[ESC]: Exit game/exit to main menu
[SPACE]: Drop package
[<] / [>]: Turn left or right


Changelog:v1.10 (stable)
  • Added new gamemode: "Time Travel" (you should find location with working radar but as fast as you can)
  • Changed main menu
  • In "Info" frame now will be showed current version of game
v1.00
  • 1 gamemode avialable: "Package Deliever" (you should deliver package with broken radar)

Other:

ttp.mfa file is the Clickteam Fusion 2.5 file (can be opened only in this program).
It allows you to change the game content.

Also, you can download early versions of game.

Stable version: 1.10
